title: Can't Create Discussions
body: So I know some boards have a level 5 requirement, but I've already posted in Help & Support (which should sync it), and the Boards Profile is showing level 5. I still get the Create a Discussion button blocked, and it says "you must be level 5 to post." Thoughts?

replies.body:
Help & Support doesn't have a level requirement, and some other regions require a higher level than 5.  If the area you're posting is specifically saying 5, then there could be a caching issue with your browser that's confusing your posting privileges.  

Just in case, try resetting your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies), disable extensions, Incognito, or try another browser entirely.  As far as I can see, everything else with your level on our side looks fine.  Let me know if it helps!
